CustomField.formula: IF(Country = "Sweden", HYPERLINK("/lightning/r/Report/00O4I000005PU5sUAG/view?queryScope=userFolders&" + CASE(Text(Business_Unit__c), "Apps", "fv1=", "Advisory","fv2=","") + FirstName + " " + LastName, "Report " + "(" + TEXT(Business_Unit__c) + ")"), HYPERLINK("lightning/r/Report/00O4I000004WD2ZUAW/view?queryScope=userFolders&" + CASE(Text(Business_Unit__c), "Apps", "fv1=", "Advisory","fv2=","DPS","fv3=","") + FirstName + " " + LastName, "Report " + "(" + TEXT(Business_Unit__c) + ")"))
CustomField.label: Account BU Owner
